tasks.title: Add --help to batch 1: analyze, build, cleanup, debug, design
tasks.description: Add --help flag documentation and pre-flight help check to 5 commands. For split commands (debug, design), modify .core.md. For standalone (analyze, build, cleanup), modify .md. Each command gets: (1) --help in flags/usage section, (2) help check in pre-flight that outputs formatted help and exits.
acceptance_criteria: All 5 files have help check in pre-flight

verification.command: for f in mahabharatha/data/commands/mahabharatha:analyze.md mahabharatha/data/commands/mahabharatha:build.md mahabharatha/data/commands/mahabharatha:cleanup.md mahabharatha/data/commands/mahabharatha:debug.core.md mahabharatha/data/commands/mahabharatha:design.core.md; do grep -q '\-\-help' "$f" || echo "MISSING: $f"; done

tasks.title: Regenerate parent files for split commands
tasks.description: For all 12 split commands (debug, design, estimate, explain, init, merge, plan, plugins, kurukshetra, select-tool, status, worker), copy the updated .core.md content to the parent .md file, replacing the top split marker from 'core, parent:' to 'core=X details=Y'.
acceptance_criteria: All 12 parent files updated with --help content matching their core files

verification.command: for cmd in debug design estimate explain init merge plan plugins kurukshetra select-tool status worker; do grep -q '\-\-help' "mahabharatha/data/commands/mahabharatha:${cmd}.md" || echo "MISSING: $cmd"; done

tasks.title: Verify all commands have --help and run tests
tasks.description: Verify all 25 primary command files contain --help. Verify all core files have help check in pre-flight. Run test suite for regressions.

verification.command: count=$(grep -rl '\-\-help' mahabharatha/data/commands/mahabharatha:*.md | grep -v '\.core\.\.\|\.details\.' | wc -l); echo "$count/25 commands have --help" && python -m pytest tests/ -x -q --ignore=tests/test_doc_engine.py 2>&1 | tail -5
